question: Andaman and Nicobar islands judiciary falls under the supervision of which of the following?
option1: A circuit bench of the Bombay High Court at Port Blair
option2: A circuit bench of the Madras High Court at Port Blair
option3: A circuit bench of the Kolkata High Court at Port Blair
option4: A circuit bench of the Kerala High Court at Port Blair
answer: A circuit bench of the Kolkata High Court at Port Blair
explanation: Andaman and Nicobar Islands judiciary falls under the supervision of the Kolkata High Court, whereby a circuit bench of the Kolkata High Court operates from Port Blair.
